video.title: Introduction to Front End Testing
video.description:
Get started with testing for the Front End. Learn how you can use tests to produce less bugs and code with confidence. 

Covering: 
 - Basics (What is testing, why do we need it?)
 - Testing Pyramid, Demo (Unit & E2E Tests)

Talk by Hans Schnedlitz at the FreeCodeCamp Vienna October 2018 meetup.

Recorded by Pusher.com.

Pusher's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoyqucxoFXDFnh3khD0rjUg

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Michael Salo
topLevelComment.text: Good talk but please zoom in when presenting code

topLevelComment.author: Kanal7 Movies 🇮🇱
topLevelComment.text: Please make a video about Selenium or Katalon! ❤️

topLevelComment.author: Doug Crozier
topLevelComment.text: Good info, but rendered somewhat useless by the AV team's decision to place the screen capture side-by-side with the camera on the presenter. When showing code, it should zoom to full screen so  the code has any chance to be readable on YouTube.

topLevelComment.author: Todd Boothbee
topLevelComment.text: That JS running infinity when dividing zero is a feature, not a bug...good one!

topLevelComment.author: Balaji G
topLevelComment.text: Completed all videos till now so much informative. Kudos to team. I know greater efforts are going on to provide standard content.
